text: Hagi Juda mopafima me'nea rankumatmimpine, Jerusalemi kumapima me'nea ne'onse kantamimpina vahe'mo'za vano nehu'za zagamera nehu'za musena hu'za vano osugahaze. Hagi anampina aravema nehu'za musema nehaza zamofo agasasankea mago'enena ontahigahaze. Hagi ana mopamo'a havizantfa hina mago vahe'mo'a anampina omanigahie.
